verses.verse: <S%H7346>Rehoboam<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> to <S%H7927>Shechem;<s%> for all <S%H3478>Israel<s%> had <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H7927>Shechem<s%> to make him <S%H4427>king.<s%>

It <S%H3379>happened,<s%> when Jeroboam the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5028>Nebat<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> of <S%H4714>it,<s%> (for he was in Egypt, where he had <S%H1272>fled<s%> from the <S%H6440>presence<s%> of <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%>), that <S%H3379>Jeroboam<s%> <S%H7725>returned<s%> out of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>
They <S%H7971>sent<s%> and <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H3379>him;<s%> and Jeroboam and all <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H935>came,<s%> and they <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H7346>Rehoboam,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

"Your <S%H1>father<s%> made our <S%H5923>yoke<s%> <S%H7185>grievous:<s%> now therefore make you the <S%H7186>grievous<s%> <S%H5656>service<s%> of your <S%H1>father,<s%> and his <S%H3515>heavy<s%> <S%H5923>yoke<s%> which he <S%H5414>put<s%> on <S%H7043>us,<s%> lighter, and we will serve <S%H5647>you.<s%>"
He <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H7725>them,<s%> "Come again to me after <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3117>days.<s%>" The <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3212>departed.<s%>

<S%H4428>King<s%> <S%H7346>Rehoboam<s%> took <S%H3289>counsel<s%> with the <S%H2205>old<s%> <S%H5975>men,<s%> who had stood <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> his <S%H1>father<s%> while he yet <S%H2416>lived,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H349>"What<s%> counsel do you <S%H3289>give<s%> me to <S%H7725>return<s%> <S%H1697>answer<s%> to this <S%H5971>people?<s%>"

They <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H559>him,<s%> saying, "If you are <S%H2896>kind<s%> to this <S%H5971>people,<s%> and <S%H7521>please<s%> <S%H1696>them,<s%> and speak <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H1697>words<s%> to <S%H5650>them,<s%> then they will be your servants <S%H3117>forever.<s%>"

But he <S%H5800>forsook<s%> the <S%H6098>counsel<s%> of the old <S%H2205>men<s%> which they had <S%H3289>given<s%> <S%H3289>him,<s%> and took counsel with the young <S%H3206>men<s%> who had grown <S%H1431>up<s%> with <S%H5975>him,<s%> who stood before <S%H6440>him.<s%>

He <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3289>them,<s%> "What counsel do you <S%H7725>give,<s%> that we may return <S%H1697>answer<s%> to this <S%H5971>people,<s%> who have <S%H1696>spoken<s%> to <S%H559>me,<s%> saying, <S%H5923><s%> 'Make the yoke that your <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H5414>put<s%> on us <S%H7043>lighter?<s%>'"

The young <S%H3206>men<s%> who had grown <S%H1431>up<s%> with him <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H559>him,<s%> saying, "Thus you shall <S%H559>tell<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> who <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H559>you,<s%> saying, <S%H1><s%> 'Your father <S%H3513>made<s%> our <S%H5923>yoke<s%> <S%H3513>heavy,<s%> but make it <S%H7043>lighter<s%> on <S%H559>us;<s%>' thus you shall say to <S%H6995>them,<s%> 'My little finger is <S%H5666>thicker<s%> than my <S%H1>father<s%>'s <S%H4975>waist.<s%>

Now <S%H6258>whereas<s%> my <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H6006>burdened<s%> you with a <S%H3515>heavy<s%> <S%H5923>yoke,<s%> I will <S%H3254>add<s%> to your <S%H5923>yoke.<s%> My <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H3256>chastised<s%> you with <S%H7752>whips,<s%> but I will chastise you with <S%H6137>scorpions.<s%>'"

So <S%H3379>Jeroboam<s%> and all the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H7346>Rehoboam<s%> the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> as the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H1696>asked,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "Come to me <S%H7725>again<s%> the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>"
The <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> them <S%H7186>roughly;<s%> and <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H7346>Rehoboam<s%> <S%H5800>forsook<s%> the <S%H6098>counsel<s%> of the old <S%H2205>men,<s%>

and <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to them after the <S%H6098>counsel<s%> of the young <S%H3206>men,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "My <S%H1>father<s%> made your <S%H5923>yoke<s%> <S%H3513>heavy,<s%> but I will <S%H3254>add<s%> to <S%H1>it.<s%> My father <S%H3256>chastised<s%> you with <S%H7752>whips,<s%> but I will chastise you with <S%H6137>scorpions.<s%>"

So the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H8085>didn't<s%> listen to the <S%H5971>people;<s%> for it was <S%H5252>brought<s%> about of <S%H430>God,<s%> that <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> might <S%H6965>establish<s%> his <S%H1697>word,<s%> which he <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H3027>by<s%> <S%H281>Ahijah<s%> the <S%H7888>Shilonite<s%> to <S%H3379>Jeroboam<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5028>Nebat.<s%>

When all <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> that the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H8085>didn't<s%> listen to <S%H5971>them,<s%> the people <S%H7725>answered<s%> the <S%H4428>king,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "What <S%H2506>portion<s%> have we in <S%H1732>David?<s%> Neither have we <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> in the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3448>Jesse!<s%> Every <S%H376>man<s%> to your <S%H168>tents,<s%> <S%H3478>Israel!<s%> Now <S%H7200>see<s%> to your own <S%H1004>house,<s%> <S%H1732>David.<s%>" So all <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H3212>departed<s%> to their <S%H168>tents.<s%>
But as for the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> who <S%H3427>lived<s%> in the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> <S%H7346>Rehoboam<s%> reigned over <S%H4427>them.<s%>

Then <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H7346>Rehoboam<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H1913>Hadoram,<s%> who was over the men subject to forced <S%H4522>labor;<s%> and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7275>stoned<s%> him to <S%H4191>death<s%> with <S%H68>stones.<s%> <S%H4428>King<s%> <S%H7346>Rehoboam<s%> made <S%H553>speed<s%> to get himself <S%H5927>up<s%> to his <S%H4818>chariot,<s%> to <S%H5127>flee<s%> to <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>
So <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6586>rebelled<s%> against the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%> to this <S%H3117>day.<s%>
